meanings.definition: Listen in on a conversation without the speakers' knowledge.
meanings.sent1: She earwigged on her friends' chat to learn their secrets.
meanings.sent2: He earwigged on the private discussion happening in the next room.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat earwigged on the birds chirping outside.
meanings.sent4: The nosy neighbor was caught earwigging on the gossip over the fence.
meanings.sent5: The spy skillfully earwigged on the enemy's plans, gathering valuable information.
